summary: A body towel for us UUNP folk.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Description:[/size][/font]
Just a towel and sexy underwear - UUNP'd.  I roleplay a ton and I got tired of bathing at an inn and having to choose between leaving the bathing room butt-naked, or in clothes/armor. It's also HDT, so..yeah

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Installation:[/size][/font]
First, go to [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/unpcm-mix/]Halo's page[/url]﻿, download his mod and show some love for christ sake. What are you, an ingrate?
... then install my conversion of course. Use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]Caliente's Bodyslide[/url] to shape it to your character's bod.

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Issues:[/size][/font]
If you're using a weird body type.. You're gonna clip because I didn't do all of the sliders for 1 or 2 pieces. It'll probably be fine for most of you unless you're using UNPK.. for some baffling reason. 
Some poses may clip as well. I might be bothered to fix if your preferable preset looks particularly egregious.

Lastly..  [font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6][b]NO REQUEST.[/b][/size][/color][/font]  I'm not even good at this anyway
author: Halo and Tankisking
